alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:29AM MST until February 15 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Periods of snow this morning with a dusting to a bit more than an inch accumulation expected. Temperatures falling to around freezing with winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures dropping to around freezing may make for local icy conditions, especially on area bridges which can freeze up more quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
